Reviewer identity stored in score metadata for each evaluation.
Average score auto-calculated per tender.

stories.title: Awarding & Status Update
stories.description: Civil body admin selects winning bid and updates tender status to awarded.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Winner receives notification instantly upon award.
All other bids locked and marked as closed after award.
Award timestamp recorded and immutable in audit logs.

epics.title: Audit & Compliance Reporting
epics.description: Maintain transparency through immutable event logs and public compliance reports.

stories.title: Immutable Event Logs
stories.description: Store all tender and bid events immutably for compliance.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Every event includes timestamp, actor, and action details.
Logs are uneditable after creation and retrievable with filtering.
Logs exportable in CSV and JSON formats.

stories.title: Public Transparency Report
stories.description: Expose awarded tenders and summary of bids for public view.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Only completed tenders appear in the transparency report.
Page load time <3 seconds for up to 500 records.
Report must include publish and award timestamps.

epics.title: Platform Administration (Super Admin Panel)
epics.description: Super admin monitors system metrics, manages civil body accounts, and handles permissions globally.

stories.title: System Metrics Dashboard
stories.description: Show real-time stats for tenders, bids, and active users.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Dashboard metrics auto-refresh every minute.
Displays key KPIs: total tenders, bids, users, and system uptime.
Error rate must remain below 1%.

stories.title: Civil Body Management
stories.description: Super admin approves, suspends, or reinstates civil body accounts.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Status change logged with reason and actor name.
Suspended accounts lose access immediately.
Audit entry generated automatically for every change.

epics.title: Notifications & Communication
epics.description: Provide automated notifications and messaging among users and admins.

stories.title: Bid & Tender Notifications
stories.description: Automated alerts for bid submission, award, and tender expiry.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Email notifications sent within one minute of triggering event.
Notification logs stored under user record for future audit.
SMS gateway placeholder prepared for future integration.

stories.title: Admin Broadcast Messages
stories.description: Super admin can broadcast platform updates to all registered users.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Message visible in dashboard notification panel for all users.
Delivery success rate must exceed 99%.
Messages archived automatically after 30 days.
